translation:
The bearer of this letter is Mr. Serafim Ribeiro, who is addressing this place regarding arrangements concerning himself and a son; I therefore kindly request from Your Excellency Your Excellency

To the citizen Minister Domingos José de Almeida. Bagé. Responded on November 30, 1841.
